member.name: T:BigEgg.Framework.Presentation.Services.MessageService
member.summary: This is the default implementation of the interface. It shows messages via the MessageBox to the user.

member.name: T:BigEgg.Framework.Applications.Services.IMessageService
member.summary: This service shows messages to the user. It returns the answer when the message was a question.
member.remarks: This interface is designed for simplicity. If you have to accomplish more advanced scenarios then we recommend implementing your own specific message service.

member.name: T:BigEgg.Framework.Presentation.Services.FileDialogService
member.summary: This is the default implementation of the interface. It shows an open or save file dialog box.
member.remarks: If the default implementation of this service doesn't serve your need then you can provide your own implementation.

member.name: T:BigEgg.Framework.Applications.Services.IFileDialogService
member.summary: This service allows a user to specify a filename to open or save a file.
member.remarks: This interface is designed for simplicity. If you have to accomplish more advanced scenarios then we recommend implementing your own specific file dialog service.

member.name: M:BigEgg.Framework.Applications.Services.IFileDialogService.ShowOpenFileDialog(System.Object,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{BigEgg.Framework.Applications.Services.FileType},BigEgg.Framework.Applications.Services.FileType,System.String)
member.summary: Shows the open file dialog box that allows a user to specify a file that should be opened.
member.param: The window that owns this OpenFileDialog.
Default filename. The directory name is used as initial directory when it is specified.
member.returns: A FileDialogResult object which contains the filename selected by the user.
member.exception: fileTypes must contain at least one item.

member.name: M:BigEgg.Framework.Applications.Services.IFileDialogService.ShowSaveFileDialog(System.Object,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{BigEgg.Framework.Applications.Services.FileType},BigEgg.Framework.Applications.Services.FileType,System.String)
member.summary: Shows the save file dialog box that allows a user to specify a filename to save a file as.
member.param: The window that owns this SaveFileDialog.
Default filename. The directory name is used as initial directory when it is specified.
member.returns: A FileDialogResult object which contains the filename entered by the user.
member.exception: fileTypes must contain at least one item.

member.name: T:BigEgg.Framework.Applications.RecentFileList
member.summary: This class encapsulates the logic for a recent file list.
member.remarks: This class can be used in a Settings file to store and load the recent file list as user settings. In Visual Studio you might need to enter the full class name "BigEgg.Framework.Applications.RecentFileList" in the "Select a type" dialog.

member.name: M:BigEgg.Framework.Applications.RecentFileList.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:BigEgg.Framework.Applications.RecentFileList.Load(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{BigEgg.Framework.Applications.RecentFile})
member.summary: Loads the specified collection into the recent file list. Use this method when you need to initialize the RecentFileList manually. This can be useful when you are using an own persistence implementation.
member.remarks: Recent file items that exist before the Load method is called are removed.
member.exception: The argument recentFiles must not be null.

member.name: M:BigEgg.Framework.Applications.RecentFileList.AddFile(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a file to the recent file list. If the file already exists in the list then it only changes the position in the list.
member.param: The path of the recent file.
member.exception: The argument fileName must not be null or empty.

member.name: P:BigEgg.Framework.Applications.RecentFileList.RecentFiles
member.summary: Gets the list of recent files.

member.name: P:BigEgg.Framework.Applications.RecentFileList.MaxFilesNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of recent files in the list.
member.remarks: If the set number is lower than the list count then the recent file list is truncated to the number.
member.exception: The value must be equal or larger than 1.

member.summary: Represents a collection that synchronizes all of it's items with the items of the specified original collection. When the original collection notifies a change via the interface then this collection synchronizes it's own items with the original items.
member.typeparam: The type of elements in the collection.
The type of elements in the original collection.
